posts.author: Luck_Dragon
posts.content:
Thanks for all the responses everyone.

gkorjax, 

yes the problem still exist. I tried the verify under the options but no go. I read on the beamdog site that it could be something with the override files. I deleted the override and it relaunched with no issues, until the last screen where you can choose to do multiplayer or play the game. posts.author: Luck_Dragon
posts.content: Hey All,  Problem has been fixed. I posted on Beamdog about the issue - subject upgrade issue - and it is known and they posted the single file in the /ovr directory which needed to be replaced. Just in case others may have the same problem.
